sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>stand</radical>ing <radical>tree</radical> that you're taking an <radical>axe</radical> to. You're going to cut down this tree to let a <kanji>new</kanji> tree grow.
meaningInfo: As you imagine yourself cutting down the standing tree, think about what new tree you'll plant in its place.
readingMnemonic: You cut down the tree to make room for a <kanji>new</kanji> one, but it falls on your <reading>shin</reading> (<ja>しん</ja>).
readingInfo: Only your shin got hit, so focus all your imaginary pain down there. Try to pull out the splinters. Ouch!
